stories.title: TellarRebelion
stories.content:
The TellarRebels are a team of galactic warriors who have combined their great powers and abilities to initiate a rebellion and take control of the galaxy.

-After battling thousands and thousands of enemies in the imperial mothership, the tellarebels manage to defeat the dark king, and who deals the finish blow would become the new king, suddenly a spear is launched from behind everyone and kills the king...
 It was Fuwen he now posses the powers of the king and begin to fight the TellarRebels.The last battle was intense but in the end Fuwen wins by killing allof them. Before Artemia's death she swear that she will stop Fuwen one day.
-After betraying his friends, Fuwen reach his goals by becoming the new Ruler of Darkness. . The story continues in The Ruler of Darkness Lore.[Soon...]
